thread.title: Pacquiao in negotiations with Mayweather, Amir for farewell bout
thread.title_full: Pacquiao in negotiations with Mayweather, Amir for farewell bout

author: NewsWire
title: Pacquiao in negotiations with Mayweather, Amir for farewell bout
text:
Johannesburg, Oct.9 (ANI): Filipino boxer Manny Pacquiao is reportedly in negotiations with Floyd Mayweather and Briton Amir Khan for a final fight. 
Earlier, Pacquiao had revealed that he might retire after his last fight in 2016. 
Pacquiao is looking forward to moving into politics full time, and has already announced his bid for a senate seat in the Philippine national elections in May. 
Speaking about his last fight, the 36-year-old revealed that he would declare his final decision in November or December, but added he doesn’t have any particular preference, Sports 24 reported. 
He,however, said that he would fight anyone before the election. 
Pacquiao lost to Mayweather in the ‘Fight of the Century’ bout in Las Vegas five months ago. (ANI) Related Posts
